name: cattitude
text: DUDE!

name: catachresis
text: Teodor just can't help showing off that he knows what a driver is.

name: wehavemagnums
text: It's second nature.

name: lexsenthur
text: What's his first nature, I wonder? To have nothing go either right nor wrong for him?

name: snatch22
text: Rejected iMac ad #17

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MagnusMuldoon, Thorfinn, Gompo, brimbrim, fosters, Moraiat, electricjelly, Sargasm, LordPretzel, bixschmix, littlefatdog, thatcrazycommie, Rakadin, SotiCoto)

name: saint
text:
...that and it's in black and white.

Wait...wait...irrelevant. my bad.

name: couchfortress
text: holy dang. i've never lamed you before, but i've lurked the entire dang pathetic saga... please stop saying 'Stad like you're fucking backgammon buddies with the fucking guy.  just. plain. weird.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, mercuri0us, fatcat, LordPretzel, Lumus, Cracker, rumblefish, Rakadin)

name: ariamaki
text:
Even using words, periods have their place in emotive content-- Like, I dunno, a hard pause? Thanks for fucking trying, but you still remain asherdan, and that makes it kind of hard for you to not fail.

V-Lame because I am over limit.

name: asherdan
text:
Woah there, dasher-man. You wait a year and spin it up when you're out of lames.

Poor. Planning. Fail. Dude.

name: overmedicated
text: WELCOME BACK ASSHOLE

name: ganymedeio
text:
I like how the alt text on the strip RIGHT BEFORE this one used periods to the effect of relaying emotion.

Also: http://fukung.net/v/8273/7eabf0c320c17f5aabd0e3240f5b9a47.gif

name: scifigrl47
text: Wow, I actually thought you were an urban legend, long since dead, or wandered off to fresh bridges.  How does one get more lames, anyhow?

name: ssddr
text: I like how onstad just kind of smash cuts from the roof to ray and teodor tied up, and nice pete wrestling with usb drivers.

name: ssddr
text: Also note that the only character in the series who uses a mac is an insane murderer.

name: zefiel
text: I mean talk about a computer which basically has AIDS

name: highpitch_83
text: Doesn't Ray have a mac (the monitor looks like one)?

name: tagrineth
text: Could just as easily be one of those TV PCs like what Sony offers at the moment.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shoesandhats, Rhadamanthus, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, sarmatron, Mangtastic, fosters, TonyHighwind, Lumus, juanclaudius, Zem, Sneakernets, Doc_Rostov, echidnaboy)

name: pie4me6
text: This sounds suspiciously like Pat's irrational hatred of barbers.

name: soticoto
text: Fine. Use S*ny products then. Don't blame me when they break right after the warranty runs out. Don't blame me when they ruin your life.

name: farqussus
text: yes, the browser window containing the motorbike that Ray dragged over the background of Mount Everest looked pretty Macish to me.

name: jonmw
text: Well, it IS very much like Ray to use a computer which is mind-buggeringly expensive and spent all its budget on cultivating a "hip", "businessy" public image.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Also notice how Onstad screws the pooch by having a guy who's in iEEE and can craft a USB killing device not knowing what a driver is.
Only the punchline with Teodor blabbing it is the merest redemption.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Okay. Now on the next panel he's calling the guy who actually built it.
Cropes Forgiveness.

name: mangtastic
text: Also I don't think Pete is in iEEE, he just murdered folks from it at random.

name: endoftheworld
text: Nice Pete would be great for one of those HP Desktop computer commercials. Moving his hands around, showing us the pictures of his murders. Showing us how he uses Microsoft Excel to track the average time it takes a CVS employee to bleed out.

name: zorglemeister
text: As an HP employee, this is fucking hilarious.  Thank you.

name: deusoma
text: You have the power. Make it happen.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: Wait... Nice Pete invented the device without even knowing how to create/install a driver?

name: coldfrog
text: If he invented it, who wrote the user manual?

name: gormster
text: Keep reading fellas.

name: stormagnet
text: I would be Theodor in this strip- doomed by didacticism.

name: i_love_kate
text: It is wrong that it took me this long to realise that Téodor's sweater has a "T" on it.

name: goatmasterflash
text: When he's strung up like that in panel 4, Teodor looks an awful lot like one of those born-without-legs people featured in documentaries on TLC.

name: dcofosho224
text: "The father of modern death" in action.
